item.description:
Meet up on Westminster Rd. Princeton at the bottom of the hill where the wind turbines are located. Westminster Rd. is located on your right about a mile past the visitors center on Mountain Hill Rd.
 The parking area is on the road surrounding the gate on Administration Rd. just to the left of the trail head for the Echo Lake trail. Hike the Stagecoach trail up to the wind turbines continue onto the Harrington Trail to the summit.
Return down The old Indian Trail to The Semuhenna trail to Harrington to The Lower Link then onto Administration Rd.

About 5 miles 3-4 hour hike depending on the speed of the group.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mt. Wachusett/Wind Turbines/Summit hike
